mapper.select: SELECT RoomID , RoomStatus , RoomSaleStatus , ProjectName , BuildingName , RoomUnit , FloorNum , FloorIndex , RoomFloorName , RoomName , RoomArea , RoomPrice , RoomTotal , RoomType FROM [V_ProjectRoom] WHERE BuildingID = #{BuildingID} ${sqlWhere} ORDER BY RoomUnit , FloorIndex*1 DESC , RoomIndex

SELECT RoomID , RoomStatus , RoomSaleStatus , ProjectName , BuildingName , RoomUnit , FloorNum , FloorIndex , RoomFloorName , RoomName , RoomArea , RoomPrice , RoomTotal , RoomType FROM [V_ProjectRoom] WHERE BuildingID = #{BuildingID} ORDER BY RoomUnit , FloorIndex DESC , RoomIndex
SELECT DISTINCT RoomType FROM V_ProjectRoom WHERE RoomType <> '' AND BuildingID = #{BuildingID}
